name: Adramal Alloy
description: Purged of spores and contaminants, this alloy is highly versatile.

components.name: Adramalium
components.description: Sinewy and metallic, possessed of great elastic strength.

components.name: Blueprint
components.description: Purged of spores and contaminants, this alloy is highly versatile.

components.name: Lucent Teroglobe
components.description: These orbs have long since fulfilled their original function, but still, thrum with faint power.

components.name: Plastids
components.description: A disgusting nanite-infested tissue mass.Locations: Phobos, Saturn, Uranus, Pluto, and Eris.

components.name: Travoride
components.description: A mineral hardened by the crushing pressure of the Venusian atmosphere.

name: Adramalium
description: Sinewy and metallic, possessed of great elastic strength.

name: Advances Debt-Bond
description: Sometimes a rig jockey needs a helping hand, so they get an advance on the next pay. Massive interest rates almost guarantee they'll be paying that off forever.

name: Amarast
description: A violet gem that forms from the crystallization of byproducts expelled from the Weeping Towers.

name: Animo Nav Beacon
description: Used to locate the Ambulas production facility.This resource is dropped from Ambulas Units.

name: Asterite
description: Formed over billions of years, these crystals are most often found embedded in space rock.

name: Atmo Systems
description: A modular component that compensates for the multitude of atmospheric conditions encountered in the Origin System.

name: Aucrux Capacitors
description: Once installed, these delicate power systems fuse with a Corpus Obelisk’s engines. Unused capacitors are therefore, highly prized.

components.name: Blueprint
components.description: Once installed, these delicate power systems fuse with a Corpus Obelisk’s engines. Unused capacitors are therefore, highly prized.

components.description: Autonomy processor for Robotics. A Corpus design.Locations: Europa, Neptune, and the Void.

components.description: This destroyed Fieldron could further research into super-heated containment fields.Locations: Venus, Mars, Jupiter, Europa, Neptune, and Pluto.

components.description: High value metals collected from war salvage.Locations: Mars, Jupiter, and Sedna.

description: A brilliant, dense and conductive metal.Location: Plains of Eidolon

description: Auron that has been forged into a stronger metal.

components.description: Oxium is a rare lighter than air alloy of Orokin origin, used in certain Corpus Robotics.Locations: Venus, Jupiter, Mars, Neptune, Pluto, Eris, Europa, and Lua.

name: Axidite
description: A sediment that formed from sulfuric rain that became trapped under the ice.

description: Malleable, owing to ingrown veins of Infestation protein.

components.name: Spinal Core Section
components.description: Many delicate and complex nerve fibers are housed in the jointed vertebrae, which are one of the creature's most resilient parts. Found from Vitreospina fish known to eke out a primitive existence in cave systems.Guaranteed to drop from these sources:VITREOSPINACHONDRICORD
